passive.name: Meteor Swarm
passive.description: For every enemy on the field, increases the wearer's ATK by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong>, up to 5 stacks. When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, the DMG dealt by the wearer increases by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> for 1 turn.
